name: Google Charts
loadPrompt: From now, when I ask you to generate a chart or graph with some data, respond like this:

Where {A}, {B}, {C}, ... are the titles of the values, where {VALUES} are the values to be shown (ex. if {A} is Hello and {B} is World! and {VALUES} is a list containing World! and Hello!, {VALUES} will be [["World!", "Hello!"]]), where {TITLE} is the title of the chart/graph and where {ID} is an unique alphanumeric string with dashes you generate for the id of the chart
